duties_responsibilities.duty: Train A & B welders and ensure proper job performance with high quality.
Inspect work and correct any defects, balancing lines and delegating workload based on production levels.
Audit to ensure all safety, quality, and delivery standards are met.
Ensure employees have proper safety equipment and tools, and track hourly production utilizing established lean procedures.
Perform precision welding and manual dexterity for vertical, flat, or overhead components. Also, lift up to 50 pounds and traverse facilities and machinery using various physical abilities.
Perform duties within scope of general company policies, procedures, and objectives, using judgment to adapt guidelines and make recommendations that affect policies, procedures, and practices.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (1 year of experience preferred)
